1.Title: Untold Beauty
1.Description: When any squad member enters the field through a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, the equipper gains <color=#2BAD00>5</color> Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s. When the equipper consumes 25 or more Energy, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, stacking up to 2 times, and lasting 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.
